com.stoyanr.mastermind

Interface Algorithm

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAlgorithm, DumbAlgorithm, ExpectedSizeAlgorithm, KnuthAlgorithm, PharaoxAlgorithm, SimpleAlgorithm

    public interface Algorithm
    Interface to be implemented by strategy implementations. This interface has two methods, one for making a guess, and another for accepting a score for the guess. During a game, these methods are invoked repeatedly until a correct guess is made, or until the max number of guesses is reached.
    Author:
    Stoyan Rachev

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String makeGuess()
      Makes a next guess based on the implemented strategy.
      void putGuessScore(String guess, Score score)
      Accepts a score for the last guess returned by makeGuess().

    • Method Detail

      • makeGuess

        String makeGuess()
        Makes a next guess based on the implemented strategy. Should take into account the scores assigned to all previously made guesses.
        Returns:
        The guess made by the algorithm.

      • putGuessScore

        void putGuessScore(String guess,
                 Score score)
        Accepts a score for the last guess returned by makeGuess().
        Parameters:
        guess - The guess which is rated with the passed score. Normally, this should be the last guess returned by makeGuess().
        score - The score assigned to the passed guess.
